meta.videoTitle: How to Prevent & Treat Colds & Flu

title_zh: 工具：锻炼恢复和碳水化合物

paragraphList.text_en: After a rigorous exercise session, the body goes through a post-exercise stress response, which includes an increase in cortisol levels and the production of white blood cells. Chronic stress due to intense exercise, lack of sleep, or other life stressors can have a negative impact on the immune system. However, incorporating carbohydrates into your post-exercise nutrition routine can help mitigate some of the inflammation induced by exercise.
paragraphList.text_zh: 在经过严格的锻炼后，身体会经历一种后运动应激反应，其中包括皮质醇水平的增加和白细胞的生产。由于剧烈运动、缺乏睡眠或其他生活压力引起的慢性压力可能对免疫系统产生负面影响。然而，将碳水化合物纳入您的运动后营养计划中可以帮助缓解运动引起的一些炎症。

paragraphList.text_en: Carbohydrates such as rice, oatmeal, pasta, and fruits have been shown to reduce markers of inflammation by around 30 to 40% when consumed after exercise, compared to just water intake. This is especially significant for individuals who exercise in a fasted state. If you prefer to exercise in the morning on an empty stomach and rely on caffeine for an energy boost, it is advisable to consume complex carbohydrates and fruits after exercising for more than 60 to 75 minutes. This intake of carbohydrates and fruits within 45 minutes to an hour post-exercise helps prevent a prolonged elevation of inflammatory molecules, ultimately supporting the body in combatting colds and flu by enhancing the function of the innate immune system.
paragraphList.text_zh: 碳水化合物，如大米、燕麦、意大利面和水果在运动后摄入后，与只喝水相比，已被证明可以降低大约30到40%的炎症标志物。这对于在禁食状态下锻炼的个人尤为重要。如果你喜欢在早上空腹运动，并依赖咖啡因来提升能量，那么建议在运动后60至75分钟后摄入复杂的碳水化合物和水果。运动后45分钟至1小时内摄入碳水化合物和水果有助于预防炎症分子的持续升高，最终通过增强先天免疫系统的功能来帮助身体对抗感冒和流感。

paragraphList.text_en: The relationship between exercise, nutrition, and immune function is crucial for overall health. By understanding how carbohydrates can positively impact post-exercise inflammation and cortisol levels, individuals can optimize their recovery and immune response. While the detailed mechanisms behind this interaction are complex and warrant further exploration in future discussions, it is clear that proper nutrition plays a vital role in maintaining a balanced immune system, especially for those engaging in regular physical activity.
paragraphList.text_zh: 运动、营养和免疫功能之间的关系对整体健康至关重要。通过了解碳水化合物如何积极影响运动后的炎症和皮质醇水平，个人可以优化恢复和免疫反应。尽管这种相互作用背后的详细机制是复杂的，值得在未来的讨论中进一步探索，但很明显，适当的营养在维持平衡的免疫系统中扮演着至关重要的角色，特别是对于那些定期进行体育活动的人来说。
